alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Denton; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Denton, southeastern Cooke and southwestern Grayson Counties through 1230 AM CST... At 1200 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sanger, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Denton, Sanger, Celina, Pilot Point, Aubrey, Krugerville, Ray Roberts Park Isle Du Bois, Ray Roberts Park Johnson Branch, Tioga and Lake Ray Roberts. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
